external_references.description: Victor, K.. (2020, May 18). Netwalker Fileless Ransomware Injected via Reflective Loading . Retrieved May 26, 2020.
Szappanos, G., Brandt, A.. (2020, May 27). Netwalker ransomware tools give insight into threat actor. Retrieved May 27, 2020.

objects.description: [Netwalker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0457)'s PowerShell script has been obfuscated with multiple layers including base64 and hexadecimal encoding and XOR-encryption, as well as obfuscated PowerShell functions and variables. [Netwalker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0457)'s DLL has also been embedded within the PowerShell script in hex format.(Citation: TrendMicro Netwalker May 2020)(Citation: Sophos Netwalker May 2020)
